title: Menjangan Beach Snorkel (Half-day)
overview: Explore the remote coral-fringed Menjangan Beach in West Bali National Park, ideal for snorkeling and wildlife spotting.

stops.description: Depart early from Sakala Resort Bali for Menjangan Beach.
Arrive and snorkel among the coral reefs.
Enjoy a picnic lunch and wildlife spotting.

title: Menjangan Island Adventure (Full-day)
overview: A full day of snorkeling, wildlife encounters, and relaxation at Menjangan Beach and Island.

stops.description: Depart early from Sakala Resort Bali for Menjangan Beach.
Snorkel and explore the coral reefs.
Take a boat trip to Menjangan Island for more snorkeling and wildlife spotting.
